name: Graduation Project (folayfila)
description:
A 3D platformer game, with an environment inspired by the German Jordanian University.  

You will fight-or jump- you way across college, and in the end you will have to beat the graduation paper. Take it and become a free man. Or lose and drop out.

How to play:

Move : w-a-s-d

Jump : Space

Spin Attack : Q

Dash : E

Pause : Esc-P

Move Camera : Mouse
